name: Puppeteer
description: Browser automation for web scraping and testing.
full_description: Enable your agent to control a headless Chrome browser. This server provides tools for navigating to URLs, taking screenshots, clicking elements, filling forms, and extracting data from web pages using Puppeteer.

tools.name: browser_screenshot
tools.description: Take a screenshot of the current page.

tools.name: browser_click
tools.description: Click an element on the page.

tools.name: browser_type
tools.description: Type text into an input field.
